Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the set of tiles of a game and variable canGoUp is used to control Athena's God power.

    • getTile

    • createBuildingMatrix

      public int[][] createBuildingMatrix()
      This method creates a matrix of integers, which represents the constructions in the board. Every cell has a number, which represents the level of the building and the presence (or not) of the dome. The presence of the dome is reported adding 4 to the integer we get from getConstructionLevel.
      Returns:
      the matrix in which there are all information about the level of every construction.

    • createConstructorMatrix

      public int[][] createConstructorMatrix()
      This method creates a matrix of integer, which represents the constructors in the board. Every constructor is identified with playerNumber, which is used as identifier in the matrix.
      Returns:
      the matrix in which there are positions of every constructor in the game.

    • searchForOccupied

      public java.util.ArrayList<Position> searchForOccupied​(Position pos)
      This method search for every occupied Tile near the Position used as parameter.
      Parameters:
      pos - it's the Position from which it searches for every occupied Tile.
      Returns:
      a list with all the Positions of every occupied Tile.
